response.original_title: A Prettier Portrait - The Importance of Arts in Inverclyde
response.overview: Callum Lindsay embarks on a journey through the past and present of Inverclyde, showcasing the sentimental value the town holds to him, detailing the reasons behind the problems the region faces now while also looking at the positive aspects of the area that are often overlooked â€“ this is done through the scope of art. Talking with political figures, museum managers and notable people in the Inverclyde arts community.
response.title: A Prettier Portrait - The Importance of Arts in Inverclyde
